com.db.chart.renderer

Class AxisRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.renderer.AxisRenderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XRenderer, YRenderer

    public abstract class AxisRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to control vertical measures, positions, yadda yadda. If the drawing is requested it will also take care of it.

      Nested Classes

      static class  AxisRenderer.LabelPosition

        style - Chart style

      • measure

        public void measure(int left,
                    int top,
                    int right,
                    int bottom)
        Measure inner bounds required in order to have enough space to display all axis elements based.
        Parameters:
        left - left position of chart
        top - top position of chart
        right - right position of chart
        bottom - bottom position of chart

      • defineAxisPosition

        protected abstract float defineAxisPosition()
        Define position of axis.
        Returns:
        Coordinate indication position of axis.

      • defineStaticLabelsPosition

        protected abstract float defineStaticLabelsPosition(float axisCoordinate,
                                                    int distanceToAxis)
        Define static position of labels. If X axis, static position means vertical labels position, otherwise, if Y it means horizontal labels position.
        Parameters:
        axisCoordinate - Coordinate indicating axis position.
        distanceToAxis - Distance to be set between labels and axis.
        Returns:
        Labels position.

      • draw

        protected abstract void draw(Canvas canvas)
        Method called from onDraw method to draw AxisController data.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to use while drawing the data

      • parsePos

        public abstract float parsePos(int index,
                               double value)
        Based in a (real) value returns the associated screen point.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of label.
        value - Value to be parsed in display coordinate.
        Returns:
        Display's coordinate

      • measureInnerChartLeft

        protected abstract float measureInnerChartLeft(int left)
        Measure the necessary padding from the chart left border defining the coordinate of the inner chart left border. Inner Chart refers only to the area where chart data will be draw, excluding labels, axis, etc.
        Parameters:
        left - Left position of chart area
        Returns:
        Coordinate of the inner left side of the chart

      • measureInnerChartTop

        protected abstract float measureInnerChartTop(int top)
        Measure the necessary padding from the chart left border defining the coordinate of the inner chart top border. Inner Chart refers only to the area where chart data will be draw, excluding labels, axis, etc.
        Parameters:
        top - Top position of chart area
        Returns:
        Coordinate of the inner top side of the chart

      • measureInnerChartRight

        protected abstract float measureInnerChartRight(int right)
        Measure the necessary padding from the chart left border defining the coordinate of the inner chart right border. Inner Chart refers only to the area where chart data will be draw, excluding labels, axis, etc.
        Parameters:
        right - Right position of chart area
        Returns:
        Coordinate of the inner right side of the chart

      • measureInnerChartBottom

        protected abstract float measureInnerChartBottom(int bottom)
        Measure the necessary padding from the chart left border defining the coordinate of the inner chart bottom border. Inner Chart refers only to the area where chart data will be draw, excluding labels, axis, etc.
        Parameters:
        bottom - Bottom position of chart area
        Returns:
        Coordinate of the inner bottom side of the chart

      • setHandleValues

        public void setHandleValues(boolean bool)
        Set renderer to handle ChartSet values, not labels.
        Parameters:
        bool - True to handle ChartSet values, False otherwise.

      • setMandatoryBorderSpacing

        public void setMandatoryBorderSpacing(boolean bool)
        Set if axis needs mandatory border spacing.
        Parameters:
        bool - True if needs mandatory border spacing, False otherwise.

      • setInnerChartBounds

        public void setInnerChartBounds(float left,
                                float top,
                                float right,
                                float bottom)
        Set inner chart bounds. Inner chart means the chart's area where datasets are drawn, chart's area excluding axis area.
        Parameters:
        left - Inner left coordinate position.
        top - Inner top coordinate position.
        right - Inner right coordinate position.
        bottom - Inner bottom coordinate position.

      • setBorderValues

        public void setBorderValues(float min,
                            float max,
                            float step)
        Force axis range of values. A step is seen as the step to be defined between 2 labels. As an example a step of 2 with a maxAxisValue of 6 will end up with {0, 2, 4, 6} as labels.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value that Y axis will have as a label
        max - The maximum value that Y axis will have as a label
        step - (real) value distance from every label

      • setBorderValues

        public void setBorderValues(float min,
                            float max)
        Force axis range of values. If minimum greater than 0 the largest divisor between the delta maximum - minimum will be set automatically as the step.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value that Y axis will have as a label
        max - The maximum value that Y axis will have as a label
